participant_1.background: i like donuts. my favorite band is the insane clown posse. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events. i play a lot of call of duty.

participant_2.name: Amina
participant_2.personality: Resilient and thoughtful, she values freedom and creativity.
participant_2.background: i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states. i was forced to marry when i was 16. my aunt helped me escape when i was 18.

content.text: Hey! I like donuts ? What about you?
